decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.
Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: ([Energy Assessment], [Predicted Energy Assessment � Flat 1, 480A Great West Road, Sheet 1/3], [Predicted Energy Assessment � Flat 1, 480A Great West Road, Sheet 2/3], [Predicted Energy Assessment � Flat 1, 480A Great West Road, Sheet 3/3], [TFEE WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 1], [DER WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 1], [TER WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 1], [DFEE WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 1], [SAP WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 1], [Predicted Energy Assessment � Flat 2, 480A Great West Road, Sheet 1/2], [Predicted Energy Assessment � Flat 2, 480A Great West Road, Sheet 2/2], [DER WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 2], [DFEE WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 2], [TFEE WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 2], [SAP WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 2], [TER WorkSheet: New dwelling created by change of use � Flat 2], [Reasonable Exception Statement], [Planning Fire Safety Statement], Received: 09/07/2024, [PL2/SM/3105-00], [PL2/SM/3105-01], [PL2/SM/3105-02], [PL2/SM/3105-03-Rev-A],[PL2/SM/3105-04-Rev-A], [PL2/SM/3105-05], Received: 18/09/2024).
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - Prior to the first use or occupation of the development full details (including manufacturers' specifications) of secure covered cycle parking facilities that accord with the West London Cycle Parking Guidance (for not less than 3 long-stay bicycles) for the occupants of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved facilities shall be fully implemented and made available for use before the development is first occupied or brought into use, The approved facilities shall be thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.
Reason: In order to support sustainable transport objectives.

Condition : 4 - Prior to the first occupation of the hereby approved development, a waste storage capacity including 1 x 140 litre refuse bin, 1 x 23 litre food bin, 1 x 55 litre red plastic and can recycling box, 1 x 55 litre blue cardboard and paper recycling box, and 1 x 55 litre green glass recycling box, 1 x 23 litre caddy food waste, and 1 x 5 litre food caddy (for internal use) shall be made available for use and thereafter shall be retained for such use at all times without obstruction. Bins shall be stored within the store at all times and shall not be left on the public highway.
Reason: In order to ensure adequate provision for waste and recycling.

Condition : 5 - (A)	The development hereby permitted shall be implemented in accordance with the approved Energy Assessment.

(B)	Prior to first occupation of any dwelling within the development hereby approved evidence (e.g. photographs, installation contracts and As-Built certificates under the Standard Assessment Procedure/National Calculation Method) shall be submitted to the local planning authority and approved in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Strategy, and any subsequent approved revisions, and achieved a 79.86% reduction in emissions.
Reason: In order to ensure that the development makes the fullest contribution to minimising carbon dioxide emissions.

Condition : 6 - Prior to first occupation of the building(s) hereby approved, the development shall have been constructed to achieve an internal water use of 105 litres/person/day or less.
Reason: In order to protect and conserve water supplies and resources.
description: Conversion of the existing self contained flat into two self contained flats with associated private amenity space, refuse and cycle storage.
